ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Help needed from players of ALL servers!
ygData.msgSnippet: Bah, i already say b4 hand tat my working hours depends on the flying program next day. If fly early we going in early , if late flying we going in late . ( We
ygData.messageBody:
Bah, i already say b4 hand tat my working hours
depends on the flying program next day. If fly early
we going in early , if late flying we going in late .
( We have to call back for working time each nite for
next day timing ) Tat why i dont wana confirm can go
or not,
imagine tat day nite flying or something.

Trifrost the Old Man
